abstractText: A one-leaf fragment of a 15th-century manuscript of the Cāndravyākaraṇa by the Buddhist grammarian Candragomin, containing the sūtrapāṭha without any commentary. The surviving portion begins with the final portion of Cāndravyākaraṇa 5.2.34, na tyādivukopāntaṃ, and ends in the middle of 5.2.73, ṅyāpos tv anāmnor bahulam.
abstractShort: A one-leaf fragment of a 15th-century manuscript of the Cāndravyākaraṇa by the Buddhist grammarian Candragomin, containing
title: Cāndravyākaraṇa
